function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Contradictory findings on the influence of temperature and humidity on covid-19 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent findings on the association of temperature and uv radiation with covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in highly populated cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of urbanization on disease propagation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of policy focus on urban context for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data collection methods for covid-19 cases and climatic indicators","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lag between date of actual cases and date of reporting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population density as a factor in covid-19 spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of mixed-effects model to analyze covid-19 cases in different cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of independent and identically distributed residuals in the model.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Multivariate normal assumption for the distribution of random effects.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Modeling the spread of contagious diseases such as covid-19 in cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharp increase in daily new cases and total confirmed cases for london","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of deaths related to covid-19 in london","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and space issues in a city like london","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Moderate negative correlation between temperature and covid-19 cases and deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negligible correlation between temperature and covid-19 cases and deaths","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reported impacts of humidity and temperature on covid-19 transmission and mortality rate","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative association between climatic parameters and covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited depth analysis based on resistivity from viruses, population mobility, and individual health factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Influence of city-level factors on covid-19 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability of covid-19 cases across different cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconclusive correlation between covid-19 transmission and climatic parameters","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global transmission of covid-19 across diverse climates","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High population density in big cities","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reproductive number r greater than 1","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Second wave of covid-19 in different cities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor housing conditions with inadequate sanitation facilities and fresh water supply increase outbreak risks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encroachment of natural habitats and closer encounters with wildlife increase the risk of zoonotic infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and confined spaces in buildings increase covid-19 transmission risk","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher ventilation rate and open windows may lead to increased exposure to air pollution and allergens.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited green space and space between buildings may lead to a higher risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High usage of crowded public transport increases the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negligible correlation between the number of confirmed new cases with minimum and maximum temperature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Threat of a second wave of covid-19 and future pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity from floor swab samples in icu and gw, indicating contamination of the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity on surfaces frequently touched by medical staff or patients, such as computer mice, trash cans, handrails, and doorknobs.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of virus positivity on patient masks due to exhaled droplets and oral secretions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of partition in cubicles allowing direct transmission of aerosols between occupants","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rates of positivity for sars-cov-2 aerosol exposure in air and swab samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 aerosol at all sampling sites, including near air outlets and in patients’ rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of virus-laden aerosols near patients and downstream from patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 aerosol distribution indicates a potential transmission distance of 4m","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater contamination of icu environment compared to general wards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal protective equipment and professional training for family members leading to familial cluster infections.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Widespread contamination of air and object surfaces in covid-19 wards by sars-cov-2.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the minimal infectious dose and aerosol transmission distance of sars-cov-2.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Human exposure to raccoon feces contaminated with baylisascaris procyonis eggs","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment for baylisascariasis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of information about survival of b. procyonis eggs and disinfection techniques","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
